response.overview: The carnival midway, the lights, the laughter, the excitement of being children at the fair - and the terror of being lost. A story for children that builds to the joy of being found. This down-to-earth story of a lost child and her desperate parents is also a powerful story of God's way of salvation that will touch the hearts of children. Interwoven with the child's story is the tragic story of a near-broken home with another message for adults, making this a meaningful program for the entire family.
response.title: A New Love For Candy
